title: I WAN'T DOMINION BACK!
body: > Everytime i come back from school when it was like 2014 I came to play dominion like the only dominion and when I came back now it's gone like why I and a lot of people enjoyed that game mode.Now im stuck with long games that can drag on for hrs  riot even used that map for some early champ spotlights.Just redo or rework the map and bring it back even if it's just in custom it would be better than just getting rid of it.I JUST WANT IT BACK COME ON MAN {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Aw man I loved Dominion! I'm not 100% sure when it'll be back, but there's always a chance of it coming around as one of the rotating game modes!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLrUzKb9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-09T20:43:21.664+0000)
>
> Aw man I loved Dominion! I'm not 100% sure when it'll be back, but there's always a chance of it coming around as one of the rotating game modes!

In [February 2016](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/retiring-dominion), Riot announced that the map would be permanently retired, only to offer an inferior replacement, "Definitely Not Dominion."

You really shouldn't be offering false hope where no real hope exists.

We did officially retire the Dominion game mode, but buried in that article is another interesting little factoid you might have missed....

> Weâ€™re considering other ways to use the Dominion map (as a featured game mode, for example) but nothing is set in stone.

AKA, there's always a chance of something coming back.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLrUzKb9,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-10T01:17:10.632+0000)
>
> We did officially retire the Dominion game mode, but buried in that article is another interesting little factoid you might have missed....
> 
> AKA, there's always a chance of something coming back.

Actually, that "something" was "Definitely Not Dominion," a woefully inferior version of the original.

The main point to take away from this is: nothing is set in stone. We're always open to bringing new game modes into the rotation, as well as old favorites every once and awhile.

If you do have any constructive comments, you're more than welcome to share those too. The best place to get the devs attention on those ideas is over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLrUzKb9,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-10T01:56:46.388+0000)
>
> The main point to take away from this is: nothing is set in stone. We're always open to bringing new game modes into the rotation, as well as old favorites every once and awhile.

Please believe me when I say that I was involved in some very heated discussions with L4T3NCY and Ghostcrawler over the retirement of Dominion (Things like "how can Riot call themselves a 'player-centric' company when they've treated Dominion fans and players like garbage since the mode's launch."  They still haven't given me an answer, btw).  Still, as apologetic as they wanted me to believe they were, they were equally as adamant that Dominion, as a permanent, capture-the-flag style game mode, would never come back.

"Definitely Not Dominion" was, in my opinion, just a cynically put together game mode using already available assets that claimed it was like, but was in reality 100% unlike, the original.  To put it in a real life equivalency, it's like substituting a can of Dr. Pepper with a glass of sugared tap water, calling it "close enough," then getting upset that people say anything at all.

> If you do have any constructive comments, you're more than welcome to share those too. The best place to get the devs attention on those ideas is over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).

Any comments I had about the new game mode, constructive or otherwise, were disregarded by the powers that be.  That is, if anyone in the RGM team paid attention to them at all.

> I was involved in some very heated discussions [...] They still haven't given me an answer, btw

Humm, I wonder why...

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBurs7,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLrUzKb9,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-10T17:44:31.228+0000)
>
> Humm, I wonder why...

They've given answers to angrier people on similar topics, so I don't understand what you're insinuating.

As a Dominion fan, I can confidently confirm to you that Riot will never bring back the map mode in a permanent form.

Riot staff determined that Dominion wasn't worth the effort to update the map to Summoner's Rift standards, even though it's lack of popularity was more the fault of the company (no promotion) than the players.  

So, as much as I'd love to have my favorite game mode return, it won't happen.
